title: Roknabad, Rafsanjan
text: Roknabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Roknābād; also known as Rokn Abad Nogh) is a village in <a href="Ferdows%20Rural%20District%20%28Kerman%20Province%29">Ferdows Rural District</a>, <a href="Ferdows%20District">Ferdows District</a>, <a href="Rafsanjan%20County">Rafsanjan County</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Province">Kerman Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 755, in 197 families.
